import React, {useState} from "react"; import OnboardingSideBar from "../components/OnboardingSideBar"; import {useForm} from "react-hook-form"; const EducationalDetails = (props: any) => { const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm(); const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false) const onSubmit =(data : any)=>{ setSubmitted(true); setTimeout( function() { setSubmitted(false ); props.history.push('/onboarding/employment') }, 2000 ); } return ( <>

EDUCATION

{submitted? <>

Sent successfully

Educational details created successfully

: <> {/*

We hate to ask, but regulations mandate us to.
Your BVN is safe with us!

*/}
}
); }; export default EducationalDetails;
